summary: REAR AXLE ON A 1993 PLYMOUTH SUNDANCE HAS A ANTI-SWAY BAR WELDED INSIDE THE AXLE.  THE SWAY BAR OR THE WELDS BROKE CAUSING A VERY LOUD NOISE.  THE REAR AXLE SOUNDS LIKE IT IS GOING TO FALL OFF. SEVERAL MECHANICS STATE THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM AND SHOULD BE HANDLED BY THE MANUFACTURER.  COST TO REPLACE THE ENTIRE REAR AXLE IS WILL OVER 1000.00.   *NLM
